manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This gel cushion is designed to provide people with a more comfortable life. Make You a Healthier Life The Cooushing Gel Seat Cushion is the perfect way to help alleviate all the aches and pains associated with sitting for long periods of time. Stop suffering and start living pain free when you add the comfort of our gel cushion for sitting anywhere.Make you a healthier life.

Surprising Durability & Excellent Comfort High-elastic gel material has excellent durability, even if it is stretched or squeezed, it can quickly return to its original shape. Sedentary without deformation. At the same time, the soft feel makes you feel more comfortable. Of course, it is also a good helper to release stress. Upgraded Honeycomb Structure The Gel seat cushion pad with a " Honeycomb structure", so it have a nice breath ability ,Can circulate air, even if you sitting for a long time, it can still Keep fresh and comfortable at all days,increases air circulation and keeps you cool. No more seat sweat! Extra Double Layer Thickness The Gel seat cushion is upgraded with double layer thickness for more support that disperses pressure evenly. Take comfort in knowing our gel is strong and will not break down over time! Non-Slip Cushion Cover Please put the bump with anti-slip function towards the bottom, so that the anti-slip block can rub against the chair to fix the position and not slide easily. The anti-slip bottom prevents it from slipping on most chairs. And the cushion is pretty suitable for office chairs, car chairs, wheelchairs, sofa and so on.

High Quality Medical Grade Gel Our seat cushion is made with gel that hugs the buttocks and tailbone while maintaining its shape. This will make anything you sit on feel more comfortable! Upgraded Premium Design Enjoy our gel cushion with ergonomic design aims at back pain and distributes the pressure of the spine. Provide you with great comfort yet keeps its shape to support your tailbone,lower back,spine and hips from those severe pressure points. You Need Lightweight and Portable The soft gel material not only makes the cushion have a good experience,but also you can take our gel seat cushion wherever you go. It's easy to use for traveling, driving, attending recreational sporting events, picnics, water activities, and much more! Enjoy the Coolness & Good Practicality The air mesh cover is breathable and allows for a maximum amount of air flow through the gel cushion.The Gel seat cushion pad with a " Honeycomb structure", so it have a nice breath ability it can still Keep fresh and comfortable at all days

Get the Pain Relief You Deserve It is especially difficult for people with back pain Waist, to sit comfortably. Our gel seat cushions for pressure relief are designed to relieve pain from the lower back, lumbar, hip, tailbone and coccyx areas. Stop suffering and start living pain free when you add the comfort of our gel cushion for sitting.Make you a healthier life.

Enjoy being Comfortable Anywhere Use our gel seat cushion for an office chair, dining chairs, while driving, airplane travel, for wheelchairs, picnics, or even sitting on the floor. Since our gel seat pad is water resistant, you can also enjoy it while bathing, swimming, boating, kayaking, kneeling while gardening, or on outdoor patio chairs. Why not be comfortable and take it with you anywhere you go!Make you a healthier life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just needed a little cushion for my cushion less bottom. This is very comfortable without being bulky. I’m very happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this for my recumbent trike
reviews.reviewText: I was getting numbness in my toes while riding my recumbent trike after about 5 miles and my chiropractor recommended finding a seat cushion because he suspected I was sitting on a nerve that was causing this phenomenon. This gel cushion is super comfy. I love the cover that comes with it because I can strap it to my trike easily - and wash it when needed. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, kinda small
reviews.reviewText: I would give a 5 if it fit the office chair, but it's a bit smaller than what I'd like. It's weirdly comfortable, and doesn't get hot. It relieved pressure on the back of my legs and tailbone. It gives you a 1 to 2 inch boost also. Comes in a cloth washable zippered case, one side is non slip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally I can do my twelve hour shifts easily thank you seller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better; but, NOT great…
reviews.reviewText: The cushion helps with the dining room table’s chairs and, on the seat of my mobility scooter; BUT, it would be more adventatious to have a thicker (3 & 1/2” to 4”), thick gel cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can sit again!
reviews.reviewText: Let's face it, I spend an unreasonable amount of time on my computer. I work from home but I also sit a ton watching cat videos and the like. I had found my back and tail bone starting to hurt from sitting. I bought this with the intention of it helping to support my big self on my chair. In reality, it became my go to item no matter where I was sitting. I take this with me in the car, at my desk and even while sitting at the dinner table. it has taken a lot of the back pain away. Worth the money. Fits my chair perfectly. Fits all chairs, Wonderful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: Since I started working from home in 2020, I've gone through two chairs and a number of cushions and pillows. The whole time, I've been fighting skin irritation and soreness. I think I've even gotten bed sores. I never had this problem at work, and I think it's because all the chairs I've ever used were upholstered. It seems difficult to fins a chair with good back support (I want something to STOP me when I lean back) that wasn't vinyl. I like the chair I have now because it's high enough at its lowest level. We all know office chairs die by staying low.I tried seat cushions, but they were buttoned and lumpy. I tried feathered pillows, but they somehow failed. The irritation would almost go, but then inch its way back. I tried baby powder, Gold bond, Hydrocortisone, zinc... everything.I was about to spend $400 on yet another chair when I decided that maybe my butt can truly breathe this way. I found this cushion and gave it a try before making a big purchase. Well, I've had it a week or two now and my butt is completely healed. I can't believe there's nothing about relieving skin irritation in the hype about this pillow! It talks about breathing, and sciatica and support, but makes no hype about sensitive skin.I saw a negative review about the cushiness of the cushion. I couldn't care less about that. My chair is already comfortable in that regard. My butt can breathe now, and it 100% irritation free all the time now.I feel like I want to buy an even bigger version of this as a backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very thick
reviews.reviewText: I like the cushion I love how it is made with the handle I will use it in the car.order other one that is Thicker.thicker

I am really liking this product! The gel stays cool no matter the length of use, does not go flat, has a handle for easy transport, is flexible enough that you can fold it in half & put in a bag/backpack, and retains it’s shape perfectly. Highly recommend over a foam option

Just the right thickness for me. I recently had hip surgery and this has really increased my comfort level in any chair and in the car as well. It's light and easy to carry with you.Have bought 2 -1 as a gift for my brother who spends a lot of time driving. I definitely recommend this. I bought the navy which looks black to me so I didn't see any point in spending extra $ for the black for the second one as a Christmas gift.
This gel seat pad is very helpful in reducing my pain in my tailbone. It provides just enough cushion and allows me to be able able to sit comfortably.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pas suffisant confortable pour certaines personnes
reviews.reviewText: J’ai acheté ce coussin parce que j’ai perdu du poids pour cause de maladie et le siège de la voiture est trop dur. Ce coussin semble d’excellente qualité mais hélas je sens quand même les alvéoles dans le gel lorsque je suis assis sur le coussin. J’aurais préféré que la construction du coussin soit unie (smooth) plutôt que percée de trous
